Title: 'The Nuremberg trials mark a seminal moment that put an end to the impunity of heads of state'

Title: COP30 presents an existential issue for Indigenous peoples
Subhead: The global climate conference was meant to be a moment of recognition for Indigenous peoples, who have been placed at the heart of President Lula's political agenda. Yet, faced with the Brazilian president's contradictions, Indigenous activists have come to the fore, determined to make their voices heard at a summit that directly affects them.
